mapper.insert:
insert into route_order( order_no, amount, create_time, departure_time, start_station_name, end_station_name, max_person_num,
direction,
driver_id,
passenger_id,
status ) values( #{orderNo}, #{amount}, now(), #{departureTime}, #{startStationName}, #{endStationName}, #{maxPersonNum},
#{direction},
#{driverId},
#{passengerId},
#{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT ro.id, ro.order_no AS orderNo, ro.passenger_id AS passengerId, ro.driver_id AS driverId, ro.start_station_name AS startStationName, ro.end_station_name AS endStationName, ro.amount, ro.direction, ro.departure_time AS epartureTime, ro.max_person_num AS maxPersonNum, ro.status, ro.create_time AS createTime, u.id, u.user_name AS userName, u.nick_name AS nickName, u.head_img AS headImg, u.sex, u.contact_number AS contactNumber, u.we_chat AS weChat, u.car_id AS carId, c.car_no AS carNo, c.car_color AS carColor, c.car_type AS carType, c.car_brand AS carBrand FROM route_order ro LEFT JOIN `user` u ON ro.driver_id = u.id LEFT JOIN car c ON u.car_id = c.id WHERE ro.status = '0'
